H1.Title: DCMI Type Vocabulary
H1.Creator: mailto:dc-usage@jiscmail.ac.uk
H1.Description: The DCMI Type Vocabulary provides a general, cross-domain list of approved terms that may be used as values for the Resource Type element to identify the genre of a resource. The terms documented here are also included in the more comprehensive document "DCMI Metadata Terms" at http://dublincore.org/documents/dcmi-terms/.
